assembly

Class WorkBench

  • java.lang.Object
    • assembly.WorkBench

  • public class WorkBench
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a WorkBench from an assemblyline.

      • chooseTasksOutOfJob

        public void chooseTasksOutOfJob()
        Selects the Tasks that are valid for this Workbench. The taskDescription is checked against the responsibilities.

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Check if the WorkBench has completed all of his Tasks.
        Returns:
        True if all the Tasks are completed. False if one or more Tasks are not completed yet.
